title: Can we eat Seafood such as Octopus,  Squid AND all seafood?
transcript: so here from bangladesh can we talk to us is it halal can we talk about what can we eat octopus is it halal ah okay i will answer inshallah so eating octopus is halal i'm not asking i'm stating eating octopus is halal full stop all creatures that live in water are halal to us unless they are toxic or harmful so everything that lives in the water is permitted for us to eat including squid as they call it or octopus
